slidetranscripts.slidetranscript:
<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="Hello! I’m your supervisor, Amandeep. Now is your chance to gather information Handy Hardware. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Be sure to take notes, either manually or by clicking the ADD TO NOTEBOOK button when it appears to save the information to a Notebook.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="Your colleague Marta will check in on you to lend a helping hand.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="I will also be keeping an eye on you and giving you a call if you are in trouble. But be careful, if I have to call you 3 times, I’ll have to take you off the project. Good luck!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="AMANDEEP: How was your meeting with Marcus Turner?
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="YOU: I think it went very well, Amandeep. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="AMANDEEP: I would like you to work on the materiality assessment as part of the audit plan for Handy Hardware Inc. Don’t worry about the other parts of the plan- your colleague Marta will take care of them. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="YOU: Great. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Span Text="AMANDEEP: You will need to calculate overall materiality, performance materiality and consider whether specific materiality is required. Marta will be around to provide you with feedback as you prepare your analysis. You can review the notebook whenever you need as you go forward with assessing the materiality. Good luck!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="You aren’t well enough prepared to interview the owner yet." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Span Text="You don’t have enough data to assess materiality." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>
